com.esri.mo2.cs.geod
Class BaseUnit

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.cs.geod.BaseNamedGeodeticObject
        |
        +--com.esri.mo2.cs.geod.BaseUnit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Equivalency, GeodeticObject, NamedObject, PEObject, Unit
Direct Known Subclasses:
DMAngularUnit, DMSAngularUnit, FactorBasedUnit
public abstract class BaseUnit
extends BaseNamedGeodeticObject
implements Unit

An abstract class which represents a unit and contains methods relating to such. Represents a unit having a suffix, precision, and name.

Field Summary
protected  int _precision
          The precision which is the number of digits displayed after the decimal point (used for GUI/display purposes)
protected  String _suffix
          The suffix which may be displayed after a value using this unit.
